name: The Tanuki & the mystical Seedling
description:
Made for the Brackeys Game Jam 2022.1
Theme: It is not real

Malicious spirits have invaded the forest and weakened the grove and its protective guardian.
To drive them away you have to find the mystical seedling to restore the groves former power. Fight your way through the forest and collect hints to see through the illusions and identify the real seedling.

WASD - Movement
Mousclick - Attack
Space - Pick a Seedling

The majority of code and all art has been created in a 2 person team during the jam.
Assets used: DOTween, Sounds from freesound.org CC0
